editComponent.name: ScaleBox
editComponent.description: A number entry box with bounds capability

addComponent.name: ComboWrapper
addComponent.description: A class for editing a choice of strings. A map can also be used where visble and XML choices are not the same.

editComponent.name: ComboWrapper
editComponent.description: A class for editing a choice of strings. A map can also be used where visble and XML choices are not the same.

addComponent.name: BooleanWrapper
addComponent.description: A class to edit a boolean in the XML.

addComponent.name: LabelWrapper
addComponent.description: A label that can be set to display a value that is persisted into the XML.

addComponent.name: PrintfWrapper
addComponent.description: A class to wrap editing a printf style format which is then persisted to XML.

addComponent.name: RadioWrapper
addComponent.description: A wrapper for a choice displayed as exclusive radio buttons.

addComponent.name: SpinnerWrapper
addComponent.description: Used to edit an integer field.

addComponent.name: TextWrapper
addComponent.description: A class to edit a text field which can be persisted to XML.

addComponent.name: FileBox
addComponent.description: A component for editing a file field.

addComponent.name: ComboAndNumberWrapper
addComponent.description: Edits a field which value can be a choice and a number (for some choices).

addComponent.name: BeanListEditor
addComponent.description: Edits a list of beans. Requires the prototype bean and editor for that bean to be set after creation.

addComponent.name: GridListEditor
addComponent.description: Edits the beans as a static grid of values. You cannot add and remove beans as with BeanListEditor.
